column5: Last weekened was pike opener here and it was very good. We fished the St. Larry and put over 50 fish in the boat with the biggest around 6 lbs. Water temps were cold but the pike were on.I also went for crappies again and was not disapointed.
thats the way its done larry !!!! great weekend on the river for sure...
Nice fish you got there. That pike looks like it has a blueish color to it. Maybe it is just the picture. I've seen blue Walleye but never blue Pike.
